description:
If the application is not working in your system, please open an issue here with more details, including app version, ubuntu version etc. I am unable to reply to bug reports here

PS: I am the author of this app
Doesn't get launched. It is installed but not launched.
after installing failed to launch the app

The Snap version of APP now works on Ubuntu 20.04. Therefore I have removed my earlier review .

This app and its online version can be used to rapidly improve Malayalam reading skills:

My skills in Malayalam were limited to speaking. This is not uncommon with Malayalis who lived and were education outside Kerala.. 

Given the frequent use of Compound words in written Malayalam, the limitation in vocabulary was affecting my ability to discern individual words within the compound words..

Olam is proving to be really useful in increasing the range of Malayalam vocabulary. Thus improving my reading skills..
summary: APP now works on Ubuntu 20.04. Thank u Developers.

description:
Wanted to do some transliteration work from English to Malayalam for the benefit of my Malayalam friends who didn't know English. 

Tried Olam and to my surprise i found the dictionary to be adequate for my needs. The interface of 'Olam' is fresh simple, intuitive and functional.

I would like to thank the developer Aboobacker MK for making available Olam English Malayalam dictionary on Ubuntu Linux and for maintaining the snap
Well? What are you waiting for!? Install it!
summary: Seriously, it has TUX on the front! It should work!

description: Unable to open in Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS, Intel® Core™ i3-4150 CPU @ 3.50GHz × 4
